mapper.update: update t_user_wallet set rmb_balance = rmb_balance + #{amount}, usable_rmb_balance = usable_rmb_balance + #{amount}, version = version + 1, update_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where id = #{userId} and version + 1 <= #{newVersion}
update t_user_wallet set rmb_balance = rmb_balance - #{amount}, usable_rmb_balance = usable_rmb_balance - #{amount}, version = version + 1, update_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where id = #{userId}
